Headline: #9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Reroute at Ashland/79th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland & X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 83rd, Loomis, 79th, Ashland due to, street blockage near Ashland/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland & #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 83rd, Loomis, 79th, Ashland due to, street blockage near Ashland/79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechancial problem on the train at Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechancial problem on the train at Ashland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
